topic.title: Website Management
topic.section:
Website Management is where the Conference Manager configures the hosted conference site. There are six steps:

  1. {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.websiteManagement.about" text="About the Conference"}
    Conference description, principal contact, copyright notice, etc.
  2. {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.websiteManagement.additional" text="Additional Website Content"}
    Homepage content, user information, and announcements
  3. {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.websiteManagement.headersFooters" text="Website Headers, Footers, Lists and Navigation Bar"}
    Titles and logos, headers, footers, etc.
  4. {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.websiteManagement.style" text="Conference Style"}
    Cascading Style Sheet and theme for conference pages
  5. {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.websiteManagement.loggingAuditing" text="Logging and Auditing"}
    Email logs, event logs, etc.
  6. {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.websiteManagement.indexing" text="Conference Indexing"}
    Search engines and metadata harvesting

More information on each step is available from the sidebar.
